Text: Good morning Kim I have a few questions to ask regarding natural gas Do you require a new customer to have a minimum load Is there also a maximum Must they be in a particular territory for example SoCalGas What length contracts are you offering r What financial hedges do you offer NGI Fixed Caller ceiling floor caps etc Are you looking for agency relationships Do you pay a commission if business is brought to you If you have any questions please call me directly at Please respond at your earliest convenience Thank you for your time Jenni Rougvie Utility Savings and Refund Services
